$TNT I'm brushing up on my Canadian knowledge. Figure if I'm going to hold a Canadian company with a very significant portion of my net worth I should at least know some Canadian trivia:
Did you know:
-Canada has 20% of the worlds fresh water.
-The oldest rocks on Earth can be found in the Canadian shield; they are about 4.28 billion years old.
-Canada has the longest highway in the world
-Canada is the world leader in mining uranium.
-The smallest town in Canada is Tilt Cove in Newfoundland
-Bono once said
created_at: "I believe the world needs more Canada."
